content: the katrine sontag shawl is very easy and beginner friendly this pattern is part of my vintage crochet series and is very typical of an 18th century wrap/shawl as could be found in the scottish highlands it is a very beautiful and feminine shawl that features ties to secure it around the body see photographs this is called a sontag shawl this shawl is very beginner friendly and features a lovely v shape as well as a v_stitch/shell edging and feminine ties to help fasten this shawl around the body for this project you will need a skein of caron cloud cake in shade cloud grey a 5 mm crochet hook a pair of scissors a tapestry needle i hope you enjoy it this easy project can be crocheted in the space of a week-end and makes a perfect present pattern will be available for instant download upon purchase this pattern is written in us terms british terms in brackets and is 6 pages long the full length video tutorial for this project is linked in the pattern for extra help you can contact me happy crochet and thank you for stopping by
